posts.title: æ­é…é™æ€åšå®¢å¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªç®¡ç†é¡µé¢
posts.text: éƒ¨åˆ†ä»£ç  H5éƒ¨åˆ† 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748<div id="app"> <div class="spinner-border" role="status" v-if="!loading"> <span class="visually-hidden">Loading...</span> </div> <div v-else style="padding: 20px;"> <div v-if="!fileUrl&&!newFile"> <button type="button" class="btn btn-light" @click="init()">é‡æ–°åŠ è½½</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-light" @click="back()">åé€€</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-light" @click="addFile()">æ–°å»ºï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸ºè¯¥ç›®å½•ä¸‹ï¼‰</button> <div>å½“å‰è·¯å¾„{{lujing}}</div> <table class="table table-striped"> <thead> <tr> <th scope="col">#åºå·</th> <th scope="col">æ–‡ä»¶åç§°</th> <th scope="col" style="max-width: 150px;">è·¯å¾„</th> <th scope="col">æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹</th> <th>æ“ä½œ</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr v-for="(item,index) in mdList" :key="index"> <th scope="row">{{index+1}}</th> <td>{{item.name}}</td> <td style="max-width: 250px; overflow-x: auto;">{{item.download_url}}</td> <td>{{item.type}}</td> <td> <button v-if="item.type=='dir'" class="btn btn-light" @click="nextDir(item.path)">ä¸‹ä¸€å±‚</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-light" v-if="item.type!='dir'" @click="editFile(item.download_url);sha=item.sha;editPath=item.path">ç¼–è¾‘</button> </td> </tr> </tbody> </table> </div> <div v-if="newFile" class="mb-3"> <label for="exampleFormControlInput1" class="form-label">è¯·è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„</label> <input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleFormControlInput1" placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„" :value="newFile"> </div> <div v-if="fileUrl||newFile" id="vditor"></div> <div v-if="fileUrl||newFile" style="margin-left: 80%;"> <button type="button" class="btn btn-success" @click="save()" style="margin-right: 10px;">ä¿å­˜</button> <button type="button" class="btn btn-danger" @click="close()">å…³é—­</button> </div> </div> </div> js éƒ¨åˆ†  { createApp, ref } from 'https://unpkg.com/vue@3/dist/vue.esm-browser.js'; import { Octokit, App } from "https://esm.sh/octokit"; createApp({ data() { return { loading: false, owner: '', repo: '', branch: '', path: 'source/_posts', token: '', user_name: '@126.com', email: '@126.com', getContentUrl: '', adddocUrl: '', /*MDæ–‡ä»¶çš„åˆ—è¡¨*/ mdList: [], /*åŠ è½½MDæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶è¿›è¡Œç¼–è¾‘*/ fileUrl: '', contentEditor: '', lujing: '', sha: '', editPath: '', newFile: '', } }, async created() { await this.init(); this.loading = true; }, methods: { async get(url) { return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { fetch('https://api.github.com' + url).then(res => { res.json().then(res => { resolve(res) }) }) }) }, async post(url, data) { return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { fetch('https://api.github.com' + url, { method: 'POST', body: data }).then(res => { res.json().then(res => { resolve(res) }) }) }) }, getContentUrlFunction() { this.getContentUrl = `/repos/${this.owner}/${this.repo}/contents/${this.path}?ref=${this.branch}` }, async init() { this.getContentUrlFunction(); const result = await this.get(this.getContentUrl); this.mdList = result; console.log(this.mdList); if (this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'file')) { this.lujing = this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'file').path.substr(0, this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'file').path.lastIndexOf('/')) } else { this.lujing = this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'dir').path.substr(0, this.mdList.find(b => b.type == 'dir').path.lastIndexOf('/')) } }, nextDir(path) { this.path = path; this.init(); }, async streamToString(stream) { const reader = stream.getReader(); let result = ''; while (true) { const { done, value } = await reader.read(); if (done) { break; } result += value; } return result; }, async editFile(url) { this.fileUrl = url; const dec = new TextDecoder("UTF-8"); const str = await new Promise(async (resolve, reject) => { fetch(this.fileUrl).then(async response => { var str = await this.streamToString(response.body) console.log(dec.decode(new Uint8Array(str.split(',')))) resolve(dec.decode(new Uint8Array(str.split(',')))) }) }) this.contentEditor = new Vditor('vditor', { height: 800, toolbarConfig: { pin: true, }, cache: { enable: false, }, after: () => { this.contentEditor.setValue(str) }, }) }, save() { this.upload(); }, close() { this.fileUrl = ''; this.newFile = ''; }, back() { this.path = this.path.substr(0, this.path.lastIndexOf('/')); this.init(); }, adddoc(file) { this.adddocUrl = `/repos/${this.owner}/${this.repo}/contents/${this.path}?ref=${this.branch}` return `/repos/${this.owner}/${this.repo}/contents/${this.editPath}?ref=${this.branch}` }, async upload() { var loading =weui.loading('ä¿å­˜ä¸­',2000); var Upurl = this.adddoc(); var sha = ''; var hpp_githubgetdocinit = { method: "GET", headers: { "content-type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8", "user-agent": "HexoPlusPlus@1.2.0", "Authorization": "token " + this.token }, } sha = await new Promise((resolve) => { fetch('https://api.github.com' + Upurl, hpp_githubgetdocinit).then(res => { res.json().then(res => { resolve(res.sha); }) }) }) const octokit = new Octokit({ auth: this.token }); if (this.newFile) { let base64 = btoa(String.fromCharCode(...new TextEncoder().encode(this.contentEditor.getValue()))) await octokit.request('PUT /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}', { owner: this.owner, repo: this.repo, path: this.lujing + '/' + this.newFile, message: "message " + new Date().getTime(), committer: { name: this.user_name, email: this.email }, content: base64, headers: { 'X-GitHub-Api-Version': '2022-11-28' } }) } else { let base64 = btoa(String.fromCharCode(...new TextEncoder().encode(this.contentEditor.getValue()))) await octokit.request('PUT /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}', { owner: this.owner, repo: this.repo, path: this.editPath, message: "message " + new Date().getTime(), committer: { name: this.user_name, email: this.email }, content: base64, sha: sha, headers: { 'X-GitHub-Api-Version': '2022-11-28' } }) } loading.hide(); weui.toast('æ“ä½œæˆåŠŸ', 3000) this.close(); }, async addFile() { this.newFile = new Date().getTime() + '.md'; setTimeout(() => { this.contentEditor = new Vditor('vditor', { height: 800, toolbarConfig: { pin: true, }, cache: { enable: false, }, after: () => { this.contentEditor.setValue('') }, }) }, 100); }, } }).mount('#app')

posts.title: js è½¬æ¢ csv to xlsx
posts.text: å¼•ç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªåŒ… 123npm i yarnyarn add node-xlsxyarn add csv-parse ä»£ç  1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556const fs = require("fs");const { parse } = require("csv-parse");const xlsx = require('node-xlsx');inputUrl='./name.csv';outputUrl='./name.xlsx';maxNum=99999;let rows = [];let excelArr = []function formatToExcel(id,row0,rowsAll){ let writeRow=[Object.keys(row0)]; rowsAll.forEach((ois)=>{ const arr=[]; for (const key in ois) { arr.push(ois[key]); } writeRow.push(arr); }); excelArr.push({name:'sheet'+id,data:writeRow});}new Promise(async (resolve, reject) => { let ids=0; fs.createReadStream(inputUrl) .pipe(parse({ columns: true, relax_quotes: true, escape: '\"', ltrim: true, rtrim: true })) .on("data", function (row) { rows.push(row); if(rows.length>=maxNum){ formatToExcel(ids,row,rows); rows=[]; ids++; console.log('ç¬¬'+ ids+'æ¬¡ è¯»å–10wæ¡æ•°æ®'); } }) .on("end", function () { formatToExcel(ids,rows[0],rows); console.log("å·²å…¨éƒ¨è¯»å–"); resolve('finished') }) .on("error", function (error) { console.log(error.message); reject(error) });}).then(o => { console.log('æ­£åœ¨è½¬æ¢ä¸ºexcelï¼Œè¯·ç¨å...\n---------------- æ•°æ®é‡è¶Šå¤§æ—¶é—´è¶Šé•¿'); var buffer=xlsx.build(excelArr); console.log('æ­£åœ¨è¾“å‡ºexcelï¼Œè¯·ç¨å...\n---------------- æ•°æ®é‡è¶Šå¤§æ—¶é—´è¶Šé•¿'); fs.writeFile(outputUrl,buffer,function(err){ console.log('è½¬æ¢å®Œæˆï¼Œ'+(err?'å¯¼å‡ºæ—¶å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°é—®é¢˜ï¼Œ':'')+'è¯·æ£€æŸ¥å¯¼å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶æ ¸å¯¹æ•°æ®'); })}).catch(o=>{ console.log(o);})

posts.text: æ‰“åŒ…dockeråŸºæœ¬è„šæœ¬ é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦é€‰æ‹©åŸºç¡€é•œåƒã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬é€‰æ‹©è¿™ä¸ª æ˜¯ä½“ç§¯æœ€å°çš„ã€‚å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨ç‰¹æ®ŠæŠ€æœ¯å°±é€‰æ‹©å¯¹åº”æŠ€æœ¯ä½¿ç”¨çš„ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ï¼Œ 123FROM alpine:latestFROM node:14-alpine3.15 å¦‚æœæœ‰éœ€è¦å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®æ—¶åŒºï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹é¡¹ç›®éœ€è¦çš„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æˆ‘è¿™åªåœ¨æœ¬åœ°è·‘ä¸€ç‚¹ä»£ç  12345# è®¾ç½®æ—¶åŒºRUN apk add --no-cache tzdata \ && cp /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime \ && echo "Asia/Shanghai" > /etc/timezone \ && apk del tzdata ä¹‹ååŸºäºä½¿ç”¨çš„æŠ€æœ¯æ·»åŠ åŒ…æ¯”å¦‚python éœ€è¦ python3å’Œpip 123RUN apk add python3 py-pipRUN pip3 install requestsRUN pip3 install schedule æœ€åè¿è¡Œå½“å‰å¯åŠ¨æŒ‡ä»¤ 1CMD [ "python", "jobs.py" ] è¿™ä¹‹ä¸‹æ˜¯é€šè¿‡github action æ‰“åŒ…docker è„šæœ¬å¯æ”¯æŒå¤šç§å¹³å°x86 arm ç­‰ 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738name: Build dockerson: push: branches: - master tags: - '*' workflow_dispatch:jobs: docker: name: Build dockers runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v3 - uses: docker/setup-qemu-action@v2 - uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2 with: install: true platforms: linux/amd64,linux/arm64/v8,linux/arm/v7 - uses: docker/login-action@v2 with: username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }} password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_TOKEN }} - name: build and push in master uses: docker/build-push-action@v4 with: push: true tags: dlld0319/jobs:latest context: . platforms: linux/amd64,linux/arm64/v8,linux/arm/v7

posts.text: testtesttest Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment æœ‰ç‚¹æ…¢ä½†ä¸æ˜¯é—®é¢˜
